member.name: P:AnalysisManagerDtaRefineryPlugIn.clsDeconMSnLogFileValidator.FileUpdated

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaRefineryPlugIn.clsDeconMSnLogFileValidator.ValidateDeconMSnLogFile(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the specified DeconMSn log file to check for intensity values in the last two columns that are zero
member.returns: True if success; false if an unrecoverable error

member.name: T:AnalysisManagerDtaRefineryPlugIn.clsDeconMSnLogFileValidator
member.summary: This class can be used to validate the data in a _DeconMSn_log.txt file It makes sure that the intensity values in the last two columns are all > 0 Values that are 0 are auto-changed to 1
